title: Textile, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave (red and black), block printed on plain weave (yellow), painted (blue/green)
dimensions:
Repeat H: 28 cm (11 in.)
Warp x Weft (a): 73 x 58 cm (28 3/4 x 22 13/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 37.5 x 29 cm (14 3/4 x 11 7/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (c): 36.5 x 28 cm (14 3/8 in. x 11 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment
description: Half drop repeat of sside view blossoms in on a red background. Outliens of pattern are black. Yellow (and therefore green) very faded. The edges of fabric to not line up with a pattern axis.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, early 19th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave (red and black), block printed on plain weave (yellow), painted (blue/green). Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment. 1975-60-19-a.
